name: Solario (SolarioGame)
description:
"Solario" is a 2.5D puzzle-platformer game where the player is Solario: a robot in love with the sun.

Solario needs light from the sun to keep their battery charged. If the battery runs dry it's lights out!

Solario can be controlled with either A+D or the left + right arrow keys to move horizontally and the space bar to jump.

Credits:
